page.title: 09Tourism in Wolsingham
page.content: Wolsingham is a good base for local {tourism}and many people depend wholly or partly on visitors for their income. Local amenities are well geared for tourists.A wide range of shops provide the{essential services and souvenirs. Places to stay include public houses like the Black Bull and the Bay Horse and caravan sites;{bed and breakfast is available at several houses. Victoria House in Angate St provides a holiday flat above a sweet shop. Public houses,take_away shops and two cafes ensure that visitors will not go hungry. Two{picnic sites,}Demesne Mill and Windy Nook,provide picnic tables, parking space,toilets and{tourist {information.
